original_text: You Israelites will fight the Edomites who still remain. You will win against them and the other nations that once belonged to me.’ That is what the Lord says, and he will do it. You Israelites will fight the Edomites who still remain. You will win against them and the other nations that once belonged to me.’
korean_text: 그들이 에돔의 남은 자와 내 이름으로 일컫는 만국을 기업으로 얻게 하리라 이 일을 행하시는 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: You Israelites will fight the Edomites
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 이스라엘 사람들은 에돔 사람들과 싸울 것이다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
